application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Sorbus (applicants ref. T1) - Approximately 6.00m: Thin crown density throughout by approximately 20%. Remove dead wood throughout crown. Reduce extraneous overlong branches back into main crown structure, up to 1.25m reduction. General maintenance.1 x Small Bay (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 4.00m: Fell to ground.1 x Laburnum (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 5.00m: Fell to Ground.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 6.00m: Reduce crown by 1.20m to shape, preserving a natural crown line. Raise crown over pavement by approximately 0.5m. Thin density by 20%. Remove dead wood. Increase light levels. General maintenance.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 5.00m: Fell to ground.Reason:  The above trees T2,T3 and T5 are of poor quality and are overcrowding T4 Holly which is a fine tree with a high amenity value.1 x Acacia (applicants ref. T6) - Approximately 6.00m: Remove, including root ball. A potentially large tree planted in a poor location.1 x Semi-mature Robinia (applicants ref. T7) Approximately 8.00m-9.00m: Thin crown density by approximately 20%. Remove dead wood throughout crown. Reduce overlong extraneous branches back into main crown structure, approximately 1.20m-1.50m. General maintenance.Group of mature mixed species shrubs (applicants ref. G1) - Trim all to tidy and shape. To control encroachment. General maintenance.(The orignal 1 x Small Bay (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 4.00m: Trim to tidy and shape up to 50cm. General maintenance. 1 x Laburnum (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 5.00m: Thin crown density by approximately 20%-25%. Remove dead wood throughout crown.1 x Holly (applicants ref. T5) - Approximately 5.00m: Reduce crown by 30cm-50cm all round. Raise crown over pavement by approximately 0.5m. remove dead wood. Thin crown density by 15%-20%. General maintenance. Description ammended)
